aboutMe: I have always been amazed at how web sites interface are made, That is what got me into learning Front-End development so i started working on web design using Figma after that I focused on mastering ReactJS to convert designs to reality, so it would become an actual interactive web pages. As an IT-Engineer i believe that leaning AI and machine learning will open doors to make our websites more dynamic and interactive.
letsConnect:
Let’s Connect!
and make something amazing together
dropMessage:
I’m currently looking for new opportunities, whether it’s a part-time of full-time position, my inbox is always open.
Drop me a message!
name: Name
chicHavenText: Chic Haven is a curated platform offering a seamless shopping experience for modern consumers who value quality and aesthetics. With an emphasis on elegant design and user-friendly functionality.
trueSkinText:
True Skin is more than just an online store, it’s a comprehensive solution that bridges the gap between product availability and customer needs.
By focusing on user experience and offering a robust dashboard for sellers.
Admin account:
Email: admin@trueskin.com
Password: 12345
budgetLabText:
Budget Lab is a personal budget management website designed to help users take control of their finances.
This project designed while training at Prokoders Company.
dashLinkMobileText:
DashLink Mobile is a state-of-the-art and user-friendly dashboard, It’s designed as a content management system for a mobile company.
This project designed while training at Prokoders Company.
Admin account:

Password: 012345
bookNookText:
Book Nook is a website for borrowing books, This website designed while training at Prokoders Company.
Find the book you’re looking for and keep the story going...
flipZoneText:
Flip Zone is a flipping cards guessing game,This page designed while training at Prokoders Company.
Let’s Have some fun.
uLearnText:
ULearn offers an innovative and engaging page for learners around the world.
This page designed while training at Prokoders Company.
technoShopText:
Techno Shop is dedicated to buy laptops and tablets.
Built on Next.js, our website is faster, more reliable, and boasts an impressive user interface.
fashionCOMText:
Fashion COM an online shopping website for clothes.
It’s convenient, fast and easy to use.
ourJourneyBlogText:
This is my Simple Project while training at Darrebni Company.
The idea of the project is a blog website page for a bloger to share his stories.
cupcakesCardsText:
This is a component design that can be used in any project.
it’s a card design, can be useful for categories, infos and products with a cool hover effect.
findWorkWithMeText:
This was my first project as a React developer that i made at my fourth year (2022) in college.
The idea is to create an interactive website for people and freelancer to help each of them find what they’re looking for.
